name: usage_date
description: Date of usage (partition field). Daily aggregation.

name: org_slug
description: Organization identifier for multi-tenancy.

name: provider
description: GenAI provider: openai, anthropic, gemini, azure_openai, aws_bedrock, gcp_vertex.

name: model
description: Model identifier used. Example: gpt-4o, claude-3-5-sonnet.

name: model_family
description: Model family for grouping. Example: gpt-4o, claude-3.5.

name: region
description: Deployment region where usage occurred.

name: input_tokens
description: Total input/prompt tokens consumed. Issue #4: VALIDATION - Must be >= 0. Pipeline processors will reject negative values and log data quality warnings.

name: output_tokens
description: Total output/completion tokens generated. Issue #4: VALIDATION - Must be >= 0. Pipeline processors will reject negative values and log data quality warnings.

name: cached_input_tokens
description: Tokens served from cache (prompt caching). Issue #4: VALIDATION - Must be >= 0.

name: total_tokens
description: Total tokens (input + output). Issue #4: VALIDATION - Must be >= 0.

name: request_count
description: Number of API requests made.

name: is_batch
description: Whether this usage was from batch API. Issue #34: Batch usage gets discounted rates.

name: successful_requests
description: Number of successful requests (2xx).

name: failed_requests
description: Number of failed requests (4xx/5xx).

name: avg_latency_ms
description: Average response latency in milliseconds.

name: hierarchy_entity_id
description: Reference to org_hierarchy entity_id for cost allocation. The leaf-level entity in the hierarchy path.

name: hierarchy_entity_name
description: Entity name for reporting (denormalized from org_hierarchy).

name: hierarchy_level_code
description: Hierarchy level code (e.g., 'department', 'project', 'team'). Identifies the depth in the hierarchy.

name: hierarchy_path
description: Full materialized path from root to entity (e.g., '/DEPT-001/PROJ-001/TEAM-001'). Enables rollup queries at any level.

name: hierarchy_path_names
description: Full path of names from root to entity (e.g., '/Engineering/Cloud Platform/DevOps'). Human-readable hierarchy trail.

name: x_pipeline_id
description: Pipeline template name. Example: genai_payg_openai.

name: x_credential_id
description: Credential ID from org_integration_credentials. KEY for multi-account isolation.

name: x_pipeline_run_date
description: The DATA date being processed. KEY for idempotent re-runs.

name: x_run_id
description: Unique pipeline run UUID for full traceability.

name: x_ingested_at
description: Timestamp when data was written to this table.
